"lbnl--53300" ": KA1401020" Physical Review Letters B 597 FT Murayama, Hitoshi. Ernest Orlando Lawrence Berkeley NationalLaboratory, Berkeley, CA (US) Free-to-read Unrestricted online access star CPT violation has an impressive limit in the neutral kaon system  (K°)-m({bar K}°) < 10⁻¹⁸ m{sub K} = 0.50 x 10⁻¹⁸ GeV. However, if viewed as a constraint on the mass-squared, the bound appears weak,  ²(K°)-m²({bar K}°) < 0.25 eV². the authors point out that neutrino oscillation offers better limits on CPT violation in this case. The comparison of solar and rector neutrino results puts the best limit on CPT violation by far,  < 1.3 x 10⁻³ eV² (90% CL).
